channel.title: Winter on Sheena Cook
channel.description: Recent content in Winter on Sheena Cook

item.title: Winter Blackbirds
item.description: Even on the dampest day Blackbirds cheerily play Tail fans and chatter Gather for a natter Filling bare trees Flutter and tease Blackbirds style It makes us smile

item.title: Snowdrops
item.description: Apricity - feeling the sunâ€™s warmth in winter. I loved this word and it falls alongside this poem Confident huddles Frosted foreground In the lee of hedges Purity nodding Come Spring Come Spring.

item.title: January Morning
item.description: Sun and frost cast Mist rises on a scene Hedges screen Fields of winter barley My misguided longing For the simplicity of Working the land I run with history That of natural beauty.
